title: Community Livestream - v.247 Update Preview
content: Join Community Managers, Veeraah and Jade, in the next Community Livestream as they preview the upcoming events and contents in v.247 New Age: Into the Abyss.

title: v.247 - New Age: Into the Abyss Update Preview
content: New Age isnâ€™t over yet - fight off monsters in the Abyssal Expedition, explore new areas, Arteria and Carcion, and more!

title: Cash Shop Update for December 6
content: Gachapon Update, Premium Surprise Style Box, Royal Styles, and more!

title: v.246 Hotfixes - December 5, 2023
content: Here you'll find a list of hotfixes that addresses a variety of bugs and issues reported within the v.246 New Age: 6th Job update.

title: [Resolved] Investigation of Scania Server Issues - December 5th, 2023
content: We are currently investigating the issue of Scania server going down.

title: [Completed] Scheduled Minor Patch - November 30, 2023
content: The minor patch has been completed and we have extended Cash Shop items for 6 hours. Please restart your Nexon Launcher or Steam to make sure that you get the latest client! Thank you for your patience.
